articles.description: All the latest Premier League reaction after leaders Liverpool beat Chelsea and Man City win at Wolves after late winner.

articles.description: Lando Norris says the decision to penalise him for a passing move on Max Verstappen in the United States Grand Prix was a “momentum killer” for his championship hopes.

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs are the only undefeated side left in the NFL after winning their Super Bowl rematch in San Francisco while the Minnesota Vikings suffered a first loss against the Detroit Lions.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 7 recap: Chiefs win Super Bowl rematch, Lions end Vikings unbeaten run

articles.description: Liverpool's "heavy metal" approach under Jurgen Klopp may be a thing of the past - but Arne Slot passed his first big test against Chelsea.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-1 Chelsea: Arne Slot's measured approach leads Liverpool surge to top

articles.description: Shakhtar were forced to leave Donetsk a decade ago, and the challenge of running an elite club has increased since Russia's invasion in 2022.
articles.title: Shakhtar Donetsk: How Ukrainian club are dealing with stark realities of war

articles.description: Spinner Jack Leach feared his international career may have been over when he was left out of the England team during the home summer.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England third Test: Jack Leach feared for international career after summer omission

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Barcelona and Norway winger Caroline Graham Hansen, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 award.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Caroline Graham Hansen

articles.description: A Lionel Messi-inspired Inter Miami have already lifted silverware in 2024, securing the Supporters’ Shield earlier this month after finishing top of Major League Soccer’s overall standings, but there is still work to do if they are to be crowned champions.
articles.title: Will Messi help bring record-breaking Inter Miami the MLS Cup?

articles.title: World Series: Los Angeles Dodgers beat New York Mets to progress

articles.description: Suzie Bates and Sophie Devine finally get their crowning moment after almost two decades in the international game.
